Class CartoonStrip

java.lang.Object
  CartoonStrip

public class CartoonStrip
extends java.lang.Object

Program to create simple animated cartoon strips using the CartoonFigure class.

Constructor Summary
CartoonStrip()
           
 
Method Summary
 void animate()
          animate creates two cartoon figures and places them on the window.

Constructor Detail

CartoonStrip

public CartoonStrip()
Method Detail

animate

public void animate()
animate creates two cartoon figures and places them on the window. Then animates them according to a fixed script by calling a series of methods on the figures.

dance

public void dance()
dance creates a cartoon figure and places it on the window. Then makes the figure dance by calling two different dance step methods several times.

public void restartUI()
